href="/best-colleges/high-point-university-2933">High Point University</a></h3><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 pyUjv">High Point, NC</p></div><div spacing="3" class="Box-w0dun1-0 doGngp"><ul class="RankList__List-sc-2xewen-0 ciVlaM DetailCardColleges__StyledRankList-cecerc-9 fCgSMB" font-size="4" spacing="0"><li class="RankList__ListItem-sc-2xewen-1 dofuo rank-list-item"><a class="RankList__RankLink-sc-2xewen-3 jHTFDg has-badge"><div class="RankList__Rank-sc-2xewen-2 fxzjOx ranked has-badge"><strong>#1</strong></div><span class="in">in </span><strong>Regional Colleges South</strong></a></li></ul><div class="flex"><div class="Box-w0dun1-0 Rating__Container-sc-1naeqqj-0 fwvgzM eRZspG Rating-sc-1naeqqj-2 kiGUEr Rating-sc-1naeqqj-2 kiGUEr" spacing="0" aria-label="4.8 xlink:href="#star"></use><defs><linearGradient id="e104d7dc-5f0d-4706-a428-68ced0edb687" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#1263D3"></stop><stop href="/best-colleges/high-point-university-2933/reviews" class="Anchor-byh49a-0 hkqDVB ml2">15 reviews</a></div><span size="4" tabindex="0" class="Span-sc-19wk4id-0 lCyXL" style="line-height: 0; cursor: pointer;"><svg role="img" fill="#6F7480" width="1.5rem" height="1.5rem" class="Icon-sc-9wq8ul-0 Tooltip__TooltipIcon-gfkrkc-0 hiHdJZ mmMeU"><use xlink:href="#help" filter="0"></use></svg></span></div></div><div size="3" spacing="0" class="MultilineEllipsis__Container-sc-1hoyc1r-5 cEYJIw Hide-kg09cx-0 hWOBmI" id="ellipsis-container"><div size="3" spacing="0" class="MultilineEllipsis__HeightRestriction-sc-1hoyc1r-6 hpOjWM"><div class="MultilineEllipsis__ContentSizedContainer-sc-1hoyc1r-7 cEohUC"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">High Point University is located in High Point, North Carolina, about 30 minutes from both Winston-Salem and Greensboro. The Slane Student Center is a hub of student activity on campus, housing fitness and recreation facilities, a climbing wall, food court, an outdoor swimming pool, sand volleyball courts and an atrium with billiard tables and sitting areas. Students can participate in many clubs and organizations on campus, including an active Greek community with about 15 fraternity and sorority chapters. High Point is a member of the NCAA Division I Big South Conference and fields nearly 15 varsity teams, known as the Panthers. Popular intramural sports include beach volleyball, kickball and flag football. All students except seniors are required to live on campus.</p><div class="MultilineEllipsis__FullHeightReferenceWrapper-sc-1hoyc1r-4 bTPBIi"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">High Point University is located in High Point, North Carolina, about 30 minutes from both Winston-Salem and Greensboro. The Slane Student Center is a hub of student activity on campus, housing fitness and recreation facilities, a climbing wall, food court, an outdoor swimming pool, sand volleyball courts and an atrium with billiard tables and sitting areas. Students can participate in many clubs and organizations on campus, including an active Greek community with about 15 fraternity and sorority chapters. High Point is a member of the NCAA Division I Big South Conference and fields nearly 15 varsity teams, known as the Panthers. Popular intramural sports include beach volleyball, kickball and flag football. All students except seniors are required to live on campus.</p></div></div></div><div><a class="Anchor-byh49a-0 deBdCQ MultilineEllipsis__ReadMore-sc-1hoyc1r-3 JzQgR filter="0"></use></svg></span></div></div><div size="3" spacing="0" class="MultilineEllipsis__Container-sc-1hoyc1r-5 cEYJIw Hide-kg09cx-0 hWOBmI" id="ellipsis-container"><div size="3" spacing="0" class="MultilineEllipsis__HeightRestriction-sc-1hoyc1r-6 hpOjWM"><div class="MultilineEllipsis__ContentSizedContainer-sc-1hoyc1r-7 cEohUC"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">Flagler College is a private, residential college located in the northeast section of Florida in the city of St. Augustine. Students admitted to the college have the opportunity to choose from more than 30 student clubs and organizations, as well as more than 10 intramural sports. Although there is no existing Greek life on campus, there are social clubs and honor fraternities for students interested in participating. All freshmen are required to live on campus during their first year unless they are living with their parents within commuting distance. Ponce De Leon Hall, the central building on campus, is a National Historic Landmark and houses roughly 480 female students. The Flagler Saints compete in the Peach Belt Conference in the NCAA Division II.</p><div class="MultilineEllipsis__FullHeightReferenceWrapper-sc-1hoyc1r-4 bTPBIi"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">Flagler College is a private, residential college located in the northeast section of Florida in the city of St. Augustine. Students admitted to the college have the opportunity to choose from more than 30 student clubs and organizations, as well as more than 10 intramural sports. Although there is no existing Greek life on campus, there are social clubs and honor fraternities for students interested in participating. All freshmen are required to live on campus during their first year unless they are living with their parents within commuting distance. Ponce De Leon Hall, the central building on campus, is a National Historic Landmark and houses roughly 480 female students. The Flagler Saints compete in the Peach Belt Conference in the NCAA Division II.</p></div></div></div><div><a class="Anchor-byh49a-0 deBdCQ MultilineEllipsis__ReadMore-sc-1hoyc1r-3 JzQgR fgUTrR"><div spacing="2" class="Box-w0dun1-0 ggHDDx"><h3 class="Heading-sc-1w5xk2o-0 fOQLJm"><a class="Anchor-byh49a-0 DetailCardColleges__StyledAnchor-cecerc-8 PlBer efWQzA card-name" href="/best-colleges/lagrange-college-1578">LaGrange College</a></h3><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 pyUjv">LaGrange, GA</p></div><div spacing="3" class="Box-w0dun1-0 doGngp"><ul class="RankList__List-sc-2xewen-0 ciVlaM DetailCardColleges__StyledRankList-cecerc-9 fCgSMB" font-size="4" spacing="0"><li class="RankList__ListItem-sc-2xewen-1 dofuo rank-list-item"><a class="RankList__RankLink-sc-2xewen-3 jHTFDg has-badge"><div class="RankList__Rank-sc-2xewen-2 fxzjOx ranked has-badge"><strong>#8</strong></div><span class="in">in </span><strong>Regional Colleges South<span>&nbsp;(tie)</span></strong></a></li></ul></div><div size="3" spacing="0" class="MultilineEllipsis__Container-sc-1hoyc1r-5 cEYJIw Hide-kg09cx-0 hWOBmI" id="ellipsis-container"><div size="3" spacing="0" class="MultilineEllipsis__HeightRestriction-sc-1hoyc1r-6 hpOjWM"><div class="MultilineEllipsis__ContentSizedContainer-sc-1hoyc1r-7 cEohUC"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">LaGrange College has the distinction of being the oldest private college in the state of Georgia. It is affiliated with the United Methodist Church and located roughly 65 miles from Atlanta in the city of LaGrange. Students admitted to the school have the opportunity to choose from more than 50 clubs and organizations, as well as to participate in a bustling Greek life that encompasses several fraternities and sororities. Students of LaGrange College are required to live on campus during their college career unless they meet certain conditions, such as living with a parent within 30 miles of campus or being 23 or older. The LaGrange Panthers field 16 varsity athletic teams and mainly compete in the USA South Athletic Conference of the NCAA Division III. More than one third of on-campus students participate in athletics at the college.</p><div class="MultilineEllipsis__FullHeightReferenceWrapper-sc-1hoyc1r-4 bTPBIi"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">LaGrange College has the distinction of being the oldest private college in the state of Georgia. It is affiliated with the United Methodist Church and located roughly 65 miles from Atlanta in the city of LaGrange. Students admitted to the school have the opportunity to choose from more than 50 clubs and organizations, as well as to participate in a bustling Greek life that encompasses several fraternities and sororities. Students of LaGrange College are required to live on campus during their college career unless they meet certain conditions, such as living with a parent within 30 miles of campus or being 23 or older. The LaGrange Panthers field 16 varsity athletic teams and mainly compete in the USA South Athletic Conference of the NCAA Division III. More than one third of on-campus students participate in athletics at the college.</p></div></div></div><div><a class="Anchor-byh49a-0 deBdCQ MultilineEllipsis__ReadMore-sc-1hoyc1r-3 JzQgR href="/best-colleges/erskine-college-3432">Erskine College</a></h3><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 pyUjv">Due West, SC</p></div><div spacing="3" class="Box-w0dun1-0 doGngp"><ul class="RankList__RankLink-sc-2xewen-3 jHTFDg has-badge"><div class="RankList__Rank-sc-2xewen-2 fxzjOx ranked has-badge"><strong>#21</strong></div><span class="in">in </span><strong>Regional Colleges South<span>&nbsp;(tie)</span></strong></a></li></ul><div class="flex"><div class="Box-w0dun1-0 Rating__Container-sc-1naeqqj-0 fwvgzM eRZspG Rating-sc-1naeqqj-2 kiGUEr Rating-sc-1naeqqj-2 kiGUEr" class="Rating__IconSvg-sc-1naeqqj-1 JKGGh"><use xlink:href="#star"></use><defs><linearGradient id="9690c2e4-2dd2-4f20-b92f-7570d0c24463" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%"><stop offset="0%" class="Span-sc-19wk4id-0 lCyXL" style="line-height: 0; cursor: pointer;"><svg role="img" fill="#6F7480" width="1.5rem" height="1.5rem" class="Icon-sc-9wq8ul-0 Tooltip__TooltipIcon-gfkrkc-0 hiHdJZ mmMeU"><use xlink:href="#help" filter="0"></use></svg></span></div></div><div size="3" spacing="0" class="MultilineEllipsis__Container-sc-1hoyc1r-5 cEYJIw Hide-kg09cx-0 hWOBmI" id="ellipsis-container"><div size="3" spacing="0" class="MultilineEllipsis__HeightRestriction-sc-1hoyc1r-6 hpOjWM"><div class="MultilineEllipsis__ContentSizedContainer-sc-1hoyc1r-7 cEohUC"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">Erskine College, located in the town of Due West, South Carolina, offers a Christian-based environment aimed at taking into account the intellectual and spiritual formation of students. Students admitted to the school have the opportunity to join a variety of clubs and organizations, and they can participate in activities at a disc golf course or at the Galloway Activities Center, which contains two gyms, racquetball courts and a climbing wall. Students are required live on campus throughout their time at the school, though there are exceptions for commuters living with a relative, married students and others. Erskine College fields 14 intercollegiate teams, known as the Flying Fleet, that compete in the NCAA Division II as a member of Conference Carolinas.</p><div class="MultilineEllipsis__FullHeightReferenceWrapper-sc-1hoyc1r-4 bTPBIi"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">Erskine College, located in the town of Due West, South Carolina, offers a Christian-based environment aimed at taking into account the intellectual and spiritual formation of students. Students admitted to the school have the opportunity to join a variety of clubs and organizations, and they can participate in activities at a disc golf course or at the Galloway Activities Center, which contains two gyms, racquetball courts and a climbing wall. Students are required live on campus throughout their time at the school, though there are exceptions for commuters living with a relative, married students and others. Erskine College fields 14 intercollegiate teams, known as the Flying Fleet, that compete in the NCAA Division II as a member of Conference Carolinas.</p></div></div></div><div><a class="Anchor-byh49a-0 deBdCQ MultilineEllipsis__ReadMore-sc-1hoyc1r-3 JzQgR DetailCardColleges__ReadMore-cecerc-6 cSDAhw card-more" href="/best-colleges/erskine-college-3432">Read More Florida SouthWestern State College is a public institution. Florida SouthWestern State College follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered least selective.</p></div></div></div><div><a class="Anchor-byh49a-0 deBdCQ
